duties_responsibilities.duty: Provides clinical and technical support for primary care providers.
Implements planned care using electronic tools to ensure efficient workflow.
Monitors equipment and performs clinical testing according to OSHA and CLIA standards.
Liaises with patients, families, specialists, and all members of the health care team.
Performs pre-visit preparation for primary care patients.
Manages virtual telehealth sessions for multiple providers using Zoom technology.
Supports clinical teams in administrative tasks and paperwork collection.
Accurately documents patient vital signs and performs CLIA waived tests.
Maintains a clean, orderly, safe working environment and oversees maintenance of supplies.
Adheres to infection control standards and safety policies.
Maintains client confidentiality and accesses patients' charts and health care information.

education_certification.credential: Completion of a Medical Assistant course from an accredited/recognized school
